ValidationBuildExtension.Violation.Message: Argument 'Source' of activity 'GetDynamicValueProperty<Int32>' is bound to an expression that contains activity 'DelayUntil'. 'DelayUntil' can cause the expression to idle during evaluation. If the argument expressions of activity 'GetDynamicValueProperty<Int32>' modify shared state then going idle during expression evaluation can produce unexpected values for the arguments.

Argument 'Source' of activity 'GetDynamicValueProperty<Int32>' is bound to an expression that contains activity 'SendHttpRequest'. 'SendHttpRequest' can cause the expression to idle during evaluation.
